Technical Assistance for preparation and drafting of programming documents of IPA 2017 programme support to Justice Sector Reforms

The general objective of the assignment is to strengthen the independence, transparency, efficiency, accountability and public trust in the Albanian justice system in line with the EU acquis and best practices.

The specific objective of this contract is to:

  • Assess the gaps on the basis of sector approach requirements in the Justice Sector;
  • Support the relevant stakeholders by providing proposed update to the Justice Sector Reform Strategy and its Action Plan to address the elements of sector approach requirements;
  • Prepare Draft programming document of IPA 2017 programme in support to Justice Sector Reforms (update of the Sector Planning Document, draft Action Document draft Annex on Public Policy Assessment) draft Annex to Financing Decision;
  • Prepare draft terms of references for complementary technical assistance.

Design Specialist/Team Leader (cat. I)

  • Master’s Degree in development studies, law. Economics, political science, sociology or related fields;
  • Fluent written and spoken English;
  • Good knowledge of EU cooperation Instruments
  • 10 years of professional experience in international an/or EU cooperation programmes
  • 5 years of professional experience in programming, project identification and formulation within the framework of the EU cooperation programmes.
  • 3 years of professional experience in working on donor-funded projects in the DG NEAR area;
  • 3 years of drafting experience in major policy/strategy/assessment papers for a major international donor;
  • Experience in designing sector budget support programmes;
  • Experience in designing justice sector budget support programmes;
  • Experience as a team leader in at least one international assistance project.
  • Experience in designing justice sector programmes (asset)

If you meet the requirements and would be interested in applying for this role please email your CV in EC format to nicte_garcia-soria@dai.com

WE ARE ONLY ABLE TO RESPOND TO CANDIDATES WHO MEET THE SPECIFICATIONS
